!Karakawei: The ancestors say that the legendary stone monument really does exist. It is a sacred child of Shilen, given life through her powerful water magic. But now it sleeps a slumber deeper than death, and there is only one thing that can awake it: the very word that Shilen first spoke to it at its creation.
